subject: IEEE-HKN - Your Membership
body:
Hi {{user}}:

Congratulations on become an inductee of IEEE-HKN. As an inductee of IEEE-HKN, you are also a member of IEEE, the world's largest technical professional organization. You are in a unique position to stay ahead of technology trends, learn new skills, and get involved in a global community innovating for a better tomorrow. IEEE and IEEE-HKN will be there as your trusted resources.

Your payment to Associated Students, Inc. (ASI) of the amount ${{payment_amount}} on {{payment_date}} is {{payment_status}}.
If you have any questions regarding this notice, please contact the chapter treasurer and provide the transaction confirmation id: {{txn_id}}

See you soon!
